metadata.name: Casper The Friendly Ghost
metadata.description: Casper the friendly ghost, the friendliest ghost you know.  Casper and his friends Wendy the Good Little Witch and Hot Stuff the Little Devil are back!  The lovable Harvey classic returns to comics to delight kids of all ages with brand new adventures in the original beloved style.  Generations of today's artists grew up on these wonderful characters and now they have an opportunity to contribute colorful new stories to their legacy.  This fun first issue features three new exciting Casper stories with his friends Wendy and Hot Stuff!
